meanings.definition: The study of life beyond Earth.
meanings.sent1: Scientists explore exobiologies to understand life on other planets.
meanings.sent2: Many researchers dedicate their careers to exobiologies.
meanings.sent3: Learning about exobiologies is like discovering a new world of possibilities.
meanings.sent4: The mysteries of exobiologies are as vast as the universe itself.
meanings.sent5: Books on exobiologies make the subject fascinating and intriguing.

meanings.definition: The branch of biology concerned with the search for extraterrestrial life.
meanings.sent1: Exobiologies involves studying organisms in outer space.
meanings.sent2: NASA scientists focus on exobiologies to find signs of life on other planets.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a class on exobiologies with aliens as guest speakers!
meanings.sent4: The quest for exobiologies is like a thrilling space adventure.
meanings.sent5: Movies often portray exobiologies as a thrilling and mysterious field.
